column4: Hello.  My sister has asked me to install ubuntu on her old laptop.  It's a Dell Inspiron 5150, ~512k RAM, probably 5+ years old.  Which version do you recommend?  I have disks for 5.10, 7.10, or could dl the latest. Thx.
guess he means 512 megs of ram, not 512k
your options are either 8.04 LTS or 9.04 or 9.10 to get something that'll have any decent support.
